q1.title: What do you usually look for when reading?
q1.subtitle: Choose what feels closest to you

options.simple: A quick understanding of the main idea

q2.title: How detailed should explanations be?
q2.subtitle: Thereâ€™s no right or wrong answer

options.simple: Straight to the point, minimal detail
options.expert: In-depth and precise, even if complex

q3.title: Which explanation feels most comfortable to read?
q3.subtitle: Example: â€œWhy drinking water mattersâ€

options.simple: Drinking water helps your body stay fresh and not feel tired.
options.student: Water keeps your body hydrated and helps you stay focused.
options.academic: Adequate hydration supports physical performance and cognitive processes.
options.expert: Hydration is essential for maintaining cellular function and physiological balance.

simple.title: Simple & Direct
simple.description: You prefer clear ideas delivered quickly, without unnecessary complexity.

student.title: Clear with Context
student.description: You like explanations that balance clarity with just enough detail.

academic.title: Structured & Conceptual
academic.description: You prefer well-organized explanations using proper terminology.

expert.title: Technical & In-Depth
expert.description: Youâ€™re comfortable with full technical detail and precise language.

header.title: How can we help you?
header.subtitle: Find answers or contact our support team

q1.question: How do I personalize my reading experience?
q1.answer: Go to Profile > Personalization to set your reading level and topic interests.

q2.question: How does the reading streak work?
q2.answer: Read at least one article per day to maintain your streak.

q3.question: How do I simplify an article?
q3.answer: Tap the "Simplify" button on any article to get an AI-generated simplified version.

q4.question: What are insights?
q4.answer: Insights are AI-generated summaries and key takeaways from articles.

q5.question: How do I change the app language?
q5.answer: Go to Profile > Language and select your preferred language.

header.title: Your Privacy Matters
header.subtitle: We're committed to protecting your personal information

informationCollect.title: Information We Collect
informationCollect.content: We collect information you provide when creating an account (name, email), your reading preferences, article interactions, and app usage data to personalize your experience.

dataUsage.title: How We Use Your Data
dataUsage.content: Your data helps us recommend relevant articles, track your reading progress, and improve app features. We use AI to simplify articles based on your reading level.

dataSecurity.title: Data Security
dataSecurity.content: We protect your information using industry-standard encryption and secure servers. Your password is encrypted and never stored in plain text.

dataSharing.title: Data Sharing
dataSharing.content: We do not sell your personal information. Data may be shared with service providers (hosting, analytics) who help us operate the app.

yourRights.title: Your Rights
yourRights.content: You can access, update, or delete your data anytime through the app settings. You can also request a copy of your data by contacting us.

dataRetention.title: Data Retention
dataRetention.content: We keep your data as long as your account is active. When you delete your account, your personal data is permanently removed from our servers.

whatIsScory.title: What is Scory?
whatIsScory.paragraph1: Scory is an intelligent reading platform designed to make learning accessible for everyone. We use AI technology to simplify complex articles, generate insights, and personalize your reading experience based on your preferences and skill level.
whatIsScory.paragraph2: Whether you're a student, professional, or lifelong learner, Scory helps you understand and retain information more effectively.

aiSimplification.title: AI-Powered Simplification
aiSimplification.description: Transform complex articles into easy-to-understand content tailored to your reading level.

smartInsights.title: Smart Insights
smartInsights.description: Get AI-generated summaries and key takeaways to grasp important concepts quickly.

personalized.title: Personalized Experience
personalized.description: Customize your reading preferences and get article recommendations that match your interests.

trackProgress.title: Track Your Progress
trackProgress.description: Build reading streaks, set weekly goals, and monitor your learning journey.

mission.title: Our Mission
mission.text: To democratize knowledge by making complex information accessible and understandable for learners of all levels, empowering everyone to grow and learn at their own pace.

header.title: Terms of Service
header.subtitle: Please read these terms carefully before using Scory

acceptance.title: Acceptance of Terms
acceptance.content: By using Scory, you agree to these terms. If you don't agree, please don't use our app.

accountRegistration.title: Account Registration
accountRegistration.content: You must provide accurate information when creating an account. Keep your password secure and notify us immediately of any unauthorized access.

contentUsage.title: Content Usage
contentUsage.content: Articles and content are for personal, non-commercial use only. You may not copy, distribute, or modify our content without permission.

aiFeatures.title: AI Features
aiFeatures.content: Our AI simplification and insights are provided as-is. While we strive for accuracy, AI-generated content may contain errors.

userConduct.title: User Conduct
userConduct.content: Don't misuse our services. This includes attempting to hack, spam, or abuse our systems or other users.

intellectualProperty.title: Intellectual Property
intellectualProperty.content: All content, features, and functionality are owned by Scory and protected by copyright and trademark laws.

termination.title: Termination
termination.content: We may suspend or terminate your account if you violate these terms. You can also delete your account anytime from settings.

changes.title: Changes to Terms
changes.content: We may update these terms occasionally. Continued use of the app means you accept any changes.
